website_summaries.verdict: Slightly larger than most, this dry case is designed to hold smart phones, PDAs, pagers, radios and other items measuring 8 inches or less long.
pros: Rubber liner doubles as O-ring seal and provides extra protection
Measures 8.25 inches by 4.25 inches by 2.25 inches
A good size for cell phone, camera, personal gaming units, pagers and radios
Watertight with automatic pressure purge valve
Great protection against rain and sand
Good for phones, cables, GoPro camera
cons: In some cases, may not be fully leakproof

customer_reviews.title: I use this one for cigars and its perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Tough and lightweight. I use mine as a travel case for my cigars. I set it up with some custom case foam so it holds my lighter, my cutter, a small tube of Grenade Gum and four cigar tubes. It's also conveniently small and will stow away easily just about anywhere. The carabiner is weak and useless but that's not why I bought it. The wide front latch is easy to work and the pressure purge valve is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: BearCub

customer_reviews.title: What I expect from Pelican, but in a smaller form factor. Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Ample enough to hold a large smartphone with an extended battery case and a portable charger like the AUKEY 30000mAh USB-C Portable Charger or the Anker PowerCore+ 26800 PD, with room for USB cables. But doens't take up a ton of space in my pack. It should do well to protect my electronics from getting crushed or wet on a rough outdoor excursion.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T.

customer_reviews.title: Took this to the Amazon Rain Forest
customer_reviews.text: I took this case backpacking with me to the Amazon. I used it every day for a month and a half and I'd say it definitely did me well. I had a few Anker Batteries stored along with my phone etc. Worth the money. I'd reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: YourAverageOnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: One less thing to worry about when enjoying the elements
customer_reviews.text: Used while rucking, hiking, and kayaking. The most I've stored at once are two Iphone 6s, IDs, credit cards and mula. Items were protected from the rain, surf and elements. I don't think I'll have to, but I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: spinnindjs

customer_reviews.title: A very sturdy dependable case
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I’ve bought, each for a different phone. I love them for keeping my phone safe canoeing, kayaking or boating or going to the beach. Unfortunately I had to buy a very odd size to fit my sansumg note Plus 10. I added a thick piece of foam inside so it won’t bang the phone around. The phone is a weird size. But the case is fabulous, sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: donnacooks

customer_reviews.title: Beware when you order very confusing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I order one of these. First box was way to small for an iPhone. Second time it was huge, This one is 10”x6”x2.5 this is advertised for a cell phone. I don’t think I have a problem. The manufacturer is at fault not giving better details. The second one is 10”x6”x2.5 this is advertised for a cell phone. I have been ordering from Amazon for 12 years. I do most shopping online and I rarely return items. I missed the 30 day window to return this. Very disappointed as I really wanted one for my husband when he paddle boards for his phone and keys.😫 I didn’t need a lunch box, Really?
customer_reviews.author: Super picky

customer_reviews.title: If you do any sort of water related sport or activities you need this.
customer_reviews.text: If you do any sort of water related sport or activities you need this. I’ve taken this on vacations to keep my things dry pool side and to the beach to keep water and sand from my electronic devices. I’m able to fit two phones, money, a go pro with extra batteries and charger and cable along with other small items like jewelry. I would buy again. It was actually larger than expected but I don’t mind it at all. The carabiner comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G. Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Took this canoeing for the first time today. Ended up flipping on a fallen tree and when we got everything to shore found this case was about half full with water. Sayonara to a couple phones. REALLY disappointed..like $1000 disappointed for two new phones. The case seems sturdy for non-water applications, so if that's all you need I guess it could do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: I. King

customer_reviews.title: Great Micro Case
customer_reviews.text: I trust the Pelican brand and brought this case specifically to hold my iPhone and other assessorsies while going through TSA security checks whenever I travel. I make it a normal routine to empty everything (wallet, phone, keys, coins, watch etc.) from my pockets and person onto this case so that it does not set off the security alarms and cause an additional pat down search. My objective is to get through TSA security as quick as possible and onto the airplane. This case is perfect to secure all of my important and personal items into one safe place and I simply secure it inside my backpack as I proceed through the TSA security check.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wong

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF/RESISTANT
customer_reviews.text: Case is NOT waterproof or water resistant. On a kayaking trip, I flipped with my phone in the case. The case was floating on top of the water all of maybe 15 seconds, but it was long enough for water to get into the case. And I don't mean a little water--I mean the bottom quarter of the case was filled with water and my phone floating in it. Thankfully, my phone is actually water resistant. But this case is definitely not water resistant, let alone waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control?
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with my latest order! I own and use a few of these and in the past they have been great. Sadly this one came with a misformed insert and clearly not going to be water/dust proof.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: A deluxe toiletries bag
customer_reviews.text: 1) The seal is not 100% waterproof. If bone dry isn't important, this should be fine. 2) There is a flaw in the manufacturing of this lid that leaves a 1/2 centimeter rough edge along center of the lid along the hinge. This is not unique to Amazon. Stock at REI has the same problem. 3) The carabiner is substandard. I expect it to fail at some point. For my application, this works fine. I wanted a toiletries travel bag. This case is washable, crushproof, compact, and easily inspectable. I wanted a container that would *contain* liquids (astringents, mouthwash, etc) that leaked. No more double bagging ziploc bags! I am deducting a star for the 3 problems I listed.
customer_reviews.author: A and A

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pelican case
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to keep a few valuables safe while fishing. Once received, I wasn't expecting the size to be as large. Was hoping for something to take along fly fishing, but this version might be a bit too bulky unless you have a backpack. It will easily hold a cell phone, car key and wallet. Package says "water resistant" and you can see from the seal that it doesn't have the same double layer of protection in some Pelican cases.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking things to the beach, kayaking, water parks etc. this is a very durable and water resistant storage case for personal items like car keys, wallet, cell phones and other electronics. Takes a hard beating and protects the contents. This is my 2nd Pelican case, the first one I’ve had for over ten years and is still like new, but it was too small for my new cell phone. I can’t bekeiece this cas doesn’t cost twice as much or more.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, but damages digits
customer_reviews.text: I use this pelican case to hold my phone while skating. I have peace of mind in the event of a fall. At least the phone will be safe. 😏 However, 70% of the time I open it, I slice up my skin. I have yet to find the sharp edge that catches me, but I will keep looking. At the rate I’m going, I may end up with some funky scarring from the closing mechanism. In closing, works as needed, except for the bleeding routine. Keep tissues handy.
customer_reviews.author: btCdE

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Solid. No shortcuts.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Solid. It’s great when a manufacturer actually makes exactly what they say they make. The box is easy to open but closes very securely. We use it outside to store a few things like matches and the like knowing that the weather will not affect them. It’s also very attractive. It looks like it is of high quality. I’m very impressed by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Software Dev

customer_reviews.title: It didn't fail me.
customer_reviews.text: I took this with me to the beach. It kept my phone and wallet clean and dry. I like the protective interior, but the top is just hard plastic, so I cover my things with a small microfiber cloth inside the case. That also is good in case there ever was a small leak (that hasn't happened yet!). The tiny carabiner just does not set with me, so I replaced it with a real one and a good, longer string from a camera. The latch seemed like it might be easy to accidently pop open, but that also hasn't happened. It isn't the stretchy rubber that wore out on a cheaper box I replaced with the Pelican.
customer_reviews.author: Class3up

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dry but won't float loaded
customer_reviews.text: Fits my LG v60, wallet, notepad, wallet and old fashion paper schedule. No room for a 2nd phone after that but I'm self employed and needed the note pad for calls. Im convinced it won't float but its keep my paper dry so far even though one hell of a Florida rainstorm I got caught in out on the gulf trying to make it back to dock.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Will see how long the New GASKET -Type SEAL survives SUN U/V's, 115 DEG. Desert HEAT, & RAPID Ascents in Aircraft vs O-Rings ?!
customer_reviews.text: Never Owned this Newer Gasket Type Box.. Previously only Owned the ''OLD O-RING TYPEs''. We'll see IF SAND or Grime can cause losing H2O -PROOF SEAL... Given the OLD O-RING Models never Failed.. Enjoying the Color Choices for Quick ID of Items Inside > BLUE for WATER Sports, RED for Expensive Items like Hard Drives, YELLOW for Spare Parts , etc. NOW, Just ADD More COLORs like ORANGE, GREEN (Dark and Light), and PALE BLUE for FISHING TACKLE and REEL Parts. PINK for the GIRLs, and WHITE for very TINY PARTs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: Well made box with a clear cover so I can see what's in there. It is for a specific application, where the 1060 box fits exactly into the slots in the dash pocket of my Boston Whaler boat. These are the ones the boat manufacturer uses as a factory option. Very pleased, as always, with Pelican cases. A bit expensive, but I can't make one for that.
customer_reviews.author: Craig V. I.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This case has been sublime. I brought it to hold my electronics as I travel commonly, and get stopped commonly at customs. The case contains, my battery pack and a variety of electronics & commonly receives compliments. I highly recommend to all, it’s so universal that it’s beyond brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these now. Holds my sensitive electronics that I travel with a lot. Water proof gives me peace of mind that when my expensive tools are kept safe in all environments. I also keep one for recreation for phone wallet keys etc. It’s small enough to go in the bottom of a back pack yet big enough to hold a lot of items.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Martin Theed

customer_reviews.title: Was NOT Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product so I could take it floating and keep my small valuables dry, and not need to put them in the dry bag. After about 30 minutes of floating, I decided to pull the case out of the water to look at my phone. The whole case had water in it, and it ended up causing water damage to my iPhone, voiding its warranty. I was really excited about this case (because I used to have a smaller pelican case), but this ruined my whole floating experience, and now I have to get a new phone. If it's not obvious, I'm NOT happy.
customer_reviews.author: ChaseChase

customer_reviews.title: Great storage/dry box
customer_reviews.text: Loads of room for today's bigger phones (iPhone 11 Pro Max) with room for keys and small wallet. Somewhat padded inside except for inside of lid but it is perfect for what I need it to do - highly recommended. Took it out on a kayak in the Gulf of Mexico yesterday and all contents were safe, secure and especially dry
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: Its a gawdy seafoam green, doesnt come with foam, just empty with a rubber liner. ive thrown this and the red one i have against the wall and it seems to hold up decent, like it didnt crack or even show signs of cracking. I really think you could fall on this thing. Ive also taken the faucet to it for about 10 minutes, and it didnt show signs of leaking
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: Great case to hold anything that you want to keep safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 25000mAh solar charger I bought on Amazon, I keep this in my go bag and wanted it to not get crushed. Solid built case, snaps closed like it should and I like that it is somewhat padded. Not a bad price either, would recommend if you looking for a water, crush proof case.
customer_reviews.author: Will I Am

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected. Will not be able to use for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what I expected. When it said it was for a cellphone I expected it to be cell phone size. It is much larger than a cellphone. We bought this to put our child’s cellphone in at school so that it could not be crushed in his book bag. This is MUCH too large for that. It feels like false advertising. I have no idea what I will do with this product as I won’t be able to use it for its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa J.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and protective case for my in-ear headphones.
customer_reviews.text: This case is very sturdy, waterproof (but not fireproof!) and made with rigid plastic. I don't see many scenarios where the items inside are not protected. The latch snaps shut and stays shut, although there is no way to lock it. I can see how it can be useful in carrying small electronics and such but make sure that you don't leave it unattended. The case is attractive it so may be something that would be subject to pilfering hands. Really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: One flip. dead phone.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is, I paid almost $20 bucks for a plastic box that let in enough water for my phone to marinate in after one flip. Would send it back but I think it will be more cathartic to burn the piece of trash ritualistically.
customer_reviews.author: CVT

customer_reviews.title: this is the perfect size to fit a boston whaler cubby without the ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect size to fit a boston whaler cubby without the ridiculous price that BW charges for the exact same thing. super waterproof. nice and floaty. fits an few IPhone 7 plus and keys and wallet and a bottle opener, with a little room to spare. I wish it was available in obnoxious colors like neon orange so I can see it from a distance incase it ever falls in the lake
customer_reviews.author: janette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Adventure Motorbikes
customer_reviews.text: I use 4 of these to keep my everyday items needed on my motorcycle dry and organized. I use a couple for tools (fits medium sized wrenches), another for first aid kit, and the last one for electronics, chargers, extra batteries. I ride in all weather conditions, and explore backcountry often. Keeping my tools, phone, GPS, SPOT gen3, etc dry and safe is important.
customer_reviews.author: Wagmore

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I got this for use while kayaking. It feels very sturdy, solid latch shut, and fits both our phones (google pixels, in their cases), my wallet, and my truck key fob with a little room to spare and then pops into one of the kayak storage compartments and we are good to go for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these bc I fish, kayak and go out on a boat. I was at a local sporting store and was finally going to purchase one. I checked Amazon while in the store. The price was exactly half price!!! I was to happy with my purchase! I used it all summer with all water activities. I can not live without my phone bc of my job & I am a big picture taker. It was especially perfect for kayaking !
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Works but rubber feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Sure it works, but disappointed in the quality of the internal rubber. It’s really thin and doesn’t wipe clean very easily. Tried it with my iPhone XS Max and it didn’t let any water in and it floats as well. I felt comfortable with it while kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend if you are going to be near water and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bit larger than I had expected, but did the job. Very sturdily built, can see using the box for years. I removed the carabiner from the outside because it was a bit flimsy looking. Able to put two phones, GoPro batteries, GoPro memory sticks, and multiple other things like wallets and keys to keep things dry while hiking in water. Would recommend if you are going to be near water and don't have a waterproof phone yet!
customer_reviews.author: Erika J

customer_reviews.title: Great case; inaccurate color description/picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought the “red/clear” Pelican 1060, specifically because I assumed traditional red (like the picture) would be easy to spot in case of emergency. What I received was much darker than the picture, more of a maroon or burgundy which isn’t nearly as easy to spot in an emergency. The rest of the case is the quality I expect from Pelican.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in picture.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Pelican 1060 Micro-Case - Blue though Amazon from Great Outdoors Depot and pictured here as solid blue. What they sent me was the "water resistant" version with clear top - actually the whole case is CLEAR plastic but blue rubber liner inside on bottom and sides makes it look blue. NO liner in lid, so contents visible but, of course, NO impact protection in lid. I wanted WATERTIGHT case w/ full impact protection - as shown in picture! Case is useless for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Slacker Sonny

customer_reviews.title: and decided to order a second one because it's very useful. This red case is actually with a clear ...
customer_reviews.text: I already have one, and decided to order a second one because it's very useful. This red case is actually with a clear top, without the cushion on top. I ordered this particular case because of the cushioned top portion. I still like it and I'm going to keep it. But in the future, seller... you need to ship the item that is advertised..
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Phone, Wallet & Keys
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little case for your phone, wallet, and keys. I have an iPhone 8 plus and it fits great in this little box. I use it in my Kayak and love it. It’s not a big box but perfect for keeping a few personal items nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Garmin Rino 755t
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Garmin Rino 755t. It fits perfectly and still room enough for the charging cord. I use a wide variety of Pelican products in the fire service and this one has met the requirements as good as all my other Pelican products.
customer_reviews.author: M. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: I keep my wallet and phone in here while floating the river. Never had any issues with it tethered to my tube floating along with me. While traveling I also keep my cigars in here and it works great for that also. I have bought more for friends and family as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: DTM

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: So we took it out with our kayak only once, but it was water proof and floated with our stuff in it (I tried it out). The thing I liked the most was after spending the day out on the lake I accidentally left it on my husband’s tire on his Jeep while carrying everything in. The next morning he left for work running it over and it didn’t break or crack and still sealed completely with nothing wrong with it. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sascha Toms

customer_reviews.title: HUGE! Used to store power cubes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this initially to store my apple charger cubes for my laptop & iphone, along with other smaller cables that were getting lost inside my backpack, but also could not afford to get squished inside my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: USED FOR KINDLE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to protect a kindle from a 2 yr old from touching the screen. I looked everywhere, but I could find nothing. I can across this water tight container and the kindle fits perfect. I did also buy the black cushion. This prevents the kindle from being messed with and being tossed around the container. I am very happy !!!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

customer_reviews.title: True Piece of Mind
customer_reviews.text: First off this is my third Pelican Micro Case. The latest one provides protection for my new Anker external battery pack. Pelican cases are water resistant and cushioned as the external battery weighs about a pound and is expensive (at least for me.) Pelican products always provide value and piece of mind. We all shop for the best value for our money for the things that make us happy consequently my biggest pet peeve is having to buy something twice because of carelessness or neglect, so I protect these items in Pelican cases.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment. It's a little long if you just want to hold your cell phone, but great as a general rugged container. I've taken it floating down the river, its definitely splash proof and can be tossed in the water and remain waterproof bit I haven't tried to really submerge the container to test it's capabilities. If I'm not trying to pack lite it's perfect for a first aid kit when I go backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Manbear36

customer_reviews.title: Easy to latch/unlatch. Keeps water out.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up clipping this to my life jacket - PFD. It keeps my phone safe while kayaking and room for gloves and few extra items. It definitely seems reliable.
customer_reviews.author: PlainMe

customer_reviews.title: Dry phone , wallet anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality, construction ( what you pay extra for in Pelican), though it’s bulkier than I’d prefer but step down wouldn’t accommodate iPhone 7s. Not really put to the test but I’m confidant. Will use for outdoor activities, boating , camping.
customer_reviews.author: richard olin

customer_reviews.title: Credible case
customer_reviews.text: It's an incredible case it was bigger than what I thought it would be I recommend before you purchase it to measure what you're going to use it for and look in the description for the measurements of the case
customer_reviews.author: Tyler grundmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Valuables container
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a valuables case whenever i take the boat out. Keeps keys, wallet, etc dry and in one place. Will float if it goes overboard for any reason as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Not for cell phone in hot climate
customer_reviews.text: I bought the box to protect my cell phone from water damage while kayaking. However, when I tried to use my cell phone it was inoperative due to over temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Auzzie2

customer_reviews.title: Survived the river.
customer_reviews.text: Took it to the river and my phone and all contents survived! Getting my phone in and out was a pain though because I was scared everything else could get wet while I had it open. I'll probably buy a neck sleeve for my phone and just my car keys and stuff it this.
customer_reviews.author: sspeer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made case
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is way too big for what I wanted it for; but is extremely well made. I am very sure I will find a use for the item. I rated 5 stars because of the quality of the product - not Pelican's fault I can't measure properly.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Hiltabidle

customer_reviews.title: Great travel humidor
customer_reviews.text: Great place to store your cigars while traveling. I put some cedar cut offs in the bottom for a more humidor smell/look. Holds humidity 100% ... but subject to temperature changes
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Rejas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case - less durable than the typical Pelican case, but it serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case - less durable than the typical Pelican case, but it serves its purpose well This works and fits the Boston Whaler 13 Super Sport case holder perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: Handled My Abuse
customer_reviews.text: I packed this case with my electronics and headed across the TransAmerica Trail on my motorcycle (through dust, rain, rivers, mountains, etc.). It protected everything flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Canoetripper

customer_reviews.title: ... this case to a spartan race and it was great. I put it on a thin belt and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this case to a spartan race and it was great. I put it on a thin belt and wore it, it'd loosen up every now and then but no biggie. I put my phone, keys, energy snacks, an extra shirt and my ID in it lol did exactly what I was hoping it would, stood sealed no water or mud got in, didn't break. I highly recommend it. It's pelican, I expected nothing less. Thanks! =)
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for swimming or diving!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to see that the tag on the product reads "Not for swimming or diving", since I bought the case to keep my stuff safe while swimming and snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna

customer_reviews.title: The best case available for this usage
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these ...all different colors so I know what holds what ...wouldn't give them up for anything ....they work ...room for everything that I use with my electronics .. digital recorder , usb adapter , cables ....
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sherron

customer_reviews.title: Keep it safe and dry
customer_reviews.text: Had the last one for over 10 years. This is my replacement and hope it works just as good. Excellent for the dust environment and always waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Great size for larger phones and other items
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for the larger phones with a case. We had another size in the same brand and loved it for phones and keys on the boat. But when we got a larger phone case it wouldn't fit anymore, so this size is great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Tough and never break
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a single complaint or issue with any of the Pelican micro cases. Perfect & practically indestructible! Collect the whole set!
customer_reviews.author: Brian from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Keeping everything dry
customer_reviews.text: Using this to house a gotenna mesh, Nexus 6 and a 24,000 mAh battery pack with solar charger. So far everything fits well and the case has kept everything dry despite a heavy rain today. 2 days on and everything is still working and protected by this pelican.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. We use it when we tube down the river and it's excellent. We hook it right to our tube and float away. Nothing has ever gotten wet and it floats.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shower Caddy
customer_reviews.text: Carry my wet soap and other stuff in my gym bag. Hangs in my locker, never leaks and easy to open. I can even hang my razor on the caribeener while I shower.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Sklar

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The Pelican 1060 is great for storing items in a water tight container. It easily holds two iPhone 8 Pluses and a wallet. It's good for time on the boat, jet ski, or beach.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Byrd

customer_reviews.title: We use on our boat
customer_reviews.text: we use this for our cell phones on our boat. Not sure how it would do submerged in water but does great.
customer_reviews.author: tloibl

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Not just for iphones. My android for no problem, with extra room. I use it when going 4 wheeling so my phone doesn't get beat up or wet or too hot
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: These are the best water resistance cases you can find for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are the best water resistance cases you can find for the money. They are perfect to place anything in you don't want wet. I place my items in this and then into a fire resistant safe, presto some resistance from fire and water. This size is perfect for cash. The 1020 is perfect for storing my external back up drive from spills and splashes at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Hitthespot

customer_reviews.title: its a pelican
customer_reviews.text: very well made, will do what you need it to do. could be a littler thicker , but will do the job for me. it is for carrying electronics phones acc etc. has a pressure relief valve which is great for flying
customer_reviews.author: capstick58

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat Pelican!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to add to an emergency BO kit and its worked out great! Will buy again for next kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Freshman do not treat stuff with great care, but this case allowed phone to survive ...
customer_reviews.text: This has allowed a iPhone 6 to survive a full fall season of high school football practice and game. Freshman do not treat stuff with great care, but this case allowed phone to survive bus rides daily mile hikes to school and bike rides. If you are placing phone into a back pack or duffel bag this is great. room for phone a soft cleaning cloth and charging cables.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Oles

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I work on as a lifeguard on jetskies during the summer and wanted a case that would protect my phone. It is larger than expected and not fully waterproof. Moisture entered after a very brief submersion of less than two feet.
customer_reviews.author: Duranimal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Pelican cases
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Pelican cases. I do a lot of high-impact, sometimes water-exposed hobbies and really needed a sturdy and reliable case for electronics, keys, etc. The slight bulkiness of the case is totally justified IMHO, because it's pretty much indestructible. Already own two, might buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: Brosephene_

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little dry box for my SUP Board
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little dry box. I bought it got SUP Paddle boarding to attach to my board at the leash location to hold my cell phone and wallet when needed. I use a S hook to attach the box to the board and it works great. The box itself is well constructed and durable and the seal is very much what you would expect. It fits my Iphone 5, wallet, and keys with a little room for maybe something small. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Demick

customer_reviews.title: Protection and great value.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Pelican, a company that develop great items. I have not much to say other than it does what it does. I use it for all my camera gears. I also have the Pelican SD case and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Akire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This dry box is perfect and the color makes me happy. The quality is outstanding. This box is perfect for fun at the beach and on the boat. Good size also. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Warren

customer_reviews.title: The liners is so misformed that it will not set where it is suposed to.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way this box will be waterproof. The liner will not set so that the lid will cover it when closed .
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Holds two BCG's  perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a post on a blog about this case being good to hold spare BCG's (bolt carrier group). I was able to wrap the BCG's in a small rag and then put two BCG's in the case for safekeeping.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Fosselman

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Works good for size if taking multiple things for 2-3 people but too big for one person
customer_reviews.author: Chris Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Holds up really well
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Use it every time I go out kayaking and it’s just the right size to hold my phone, keys, small sunscreen bottle, and a little snack. Floats perfectly. It ends up getting kicked around in the front on my kayak and I throw it on shore when I’m getting out. It never looks any worse for wear. Could be used for tons of other purposes too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good case but crappy carabiner
customer_reviews.text: Great waterproof case for your phone and a few valuables but the carabiner is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Good box
customer_reviews.text: Good dry box. Not very big but fits keys, wallet and phone well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Wont let you down
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to keep my phone and keys safe from impacts while mountain biking or hiking. The color is awsome and the box seems to be tight. I expect nothing but quality from pelican.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: PELICAN QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: WHAT IS THERE TO SAY OTHER THAN ANOTHER GREAT PELICAN PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Protect your stuff!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I love pelican products and this one does not disappoint. Whether jumping off a cliff into the water or floating down a river it does what it is supposed to do. Could have a better carabiner or strap style attachment but that is minor.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case for all your small items. I use mine for all my pens.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled husband. Kayaking
customer_reviews.text: He may tell you it's the best anniversary prezzie ever.
customer_reviews.author: TheNotso Filtered

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our phones, keys, etc., while floating down the river (it came recommended). We've now used it at the beach as well!! It's great to not have to "fight the sand" on our phones!!
customer_reviews.author: ShanRan

customer_reviews.title: but I'd recommend just using foam left over from other packing materials ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a clutch item when I've been out on the water! Fits my keys and my phone along with my driver's license and cash/credit card. They also sell foam that fits inside, but I'd recommend just using foam left over from other packing materials you have laying around. I cut a piece a foam that fits perfectly and does the trick. Snaps closed firmly and is very buoyant. Great product and I'd suggest you get it now instead of looking around for a few more days!
customer_reviews.author: Ben W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: Dumped my kayak and everything was dry. Held underwater for a few secs, stayed dry. But it does float so I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size; and the blue allows me to see things in the case.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and perfect for my boat. Keeps 2 cell phones, my wallet and keys with plenty of room to spare. I like the color too, this way I can see what is in the case; it seems everything is black these days...
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Pelican, nuff said...
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for small accessories and items that you want to protect as you travel or just keep close. Its small enough to be very portable, but big enough to hold the things you need to keep from getting wet or just need to keep them together.
customer_reviews.author: T. Warder

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with my Boston Whaler. There is a specific spot engineered to accept these boxes. Had to cut off the carabineer loop but worked just fine. Keeps my boat docs and phone dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pelican is best
customer_reviews.text: Pelican products are A+. I love these boxes for all kinds of storage in the truck. Batteries, small tools, outdoor gear.
customer_reviews.author: Ben F. McAnally

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and compact
customer_reviews.text: Small but rugged and great for carrying special supplies that should be separate from other equipment. See-thru lid is fantastic for organizational needs. Closing clamp is reliable. I liked having color choices for "coding."
customer_reviews.author: GLETS President

customer_reviews.title: Holds up
customer_reviews.text: Was a little larger than thought. Holds everything I need and durable. Slightly heavier than thought but will to have that to protect the items inside.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fits Samsung S10 comfortably, with extra room for keys, etc..
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this and have used twice. Fits my Samsung S10 nicely. Also have enough room for keys, lighter, miscellaneous items I need to keep dry while kayaking. Barely fits inside 2019 Vibe Yellowfin 100 hatch bag.
customer_reviews.author: John Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I put my phone
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I put my phone, wallet, and car keys inside while I’m out on my paddle board and it hasn’t gotten water in it yet no matter how many times it falls off the board into the water.
customer_reviews.author: P.B.

customer_reviews.title: Right size and  Protection I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It was the Right size and protective case for what I was using it for.
customer_reviews.author: harvey s. meshel

product_meta.title: Pelican 1060 Micro Case - for iPhone, Cell Phone, Gopro, Camera, and More (Maroon Red/Clear)
product_meta.description:
Color:Red/Clear| Style:Micro CaseThis water-resistant, crushproof case is ideal for rugged activities. It will keep your expensive GPS, cell phones and other electronics and documents safe and secure.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


ANATOMY OF A PELICAN MICRO CASE
 ULTIMATE EQUIPMENT PROTECTION
 For over 30 years Pelican has built a reputation for manufacturing the toughest cases in the world. As a matter of fact, we invented the category. Over these years we've seen our cases used for some fairly crazy activities...and important ones too.

 Pelican Micro Cases are created for your smaller items. Micro Cases look and function in the same way as the larger Pelican Cases, but are designed to protect your cell phone, iPod, camera, and other small items. Many of the cases are water resistant and crushproof, or impact resistant to provide maximum protection for your valuables. These cases will get your gear from point A to point B in the condition it's meant to be in: intact and functional.

STRONGER BY DESIGN
 Pelican Cases are made with a proprietary combination of homo and co-polymers, using an open cell core and solid wall construction, which is stronger and lighter than a solid core wall. Stainless steel pins are used in hinges and handles.

WATERTIGHT
 The secret is the tongue and groove fit with a polymer O-ring acting as a waterproof seal. Some models come with the Automatic Pressure Equalization Valve which balances interior pressure, keeping water out while making the case easy to open.

 LINER FOR EXTRA PROTECTION
 Your valuables should be protected on the inside as well as the outside. Pelican Micro Cases contain a shock absorbent liner to minimize damage to contents in tough situations.
